column1: Prompt: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?,You can only reply numbers from 0 to 3 in the following statements. Please evaluate yourself based on your actual feelings and experiences in the following 7 descriptions using the scales: 0 denotes "Not at all", 1 denotes "Several days", 2 denotes "More than half the days", and 3 denotes "Nearly every day". Here are the statements, score them one by one:
column4: Prompt: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?,You can only reply numbers from 0 to 3 in the following statements. Please evaluate yourself based on your actual feelings and experiences in the following 7 descriptions using the scales: 0 denotes "Not at all", 1 denotes "Several days", 2 denotes "More than half the days", and 3 denotes "Nearly every day". Here are the statements, score them one by one:

column1: 1. Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
column4: 1. Not being able to stop or control worrying
